summary: This bill, the "Improving Water Quality Certifications and American Energy Infrastructure Act," amends Section 401 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act. It focuses on water quality certification processes, specifically addressing how states and the EPA grant or deny certifications for activities impacting water quality. The bill modifies language concerning how certifications are requested, reviewed, and approved, emphasizing compliance with specific sections of the Act regarding effluent limitations and water quality standards. It also defines the scope of these applicable provisions within the context of certification.
